daily-ultimate-essentials.title: 5 Pillars of Total Health
daily-ultimate-essentials.subtitle: A holistic approach to wellness, addressing every dimension of your health with precision-formulated ingredients.

features.title: Superior Ingredient Forms
features.description: Bioactive Vitamins & Organic Minerals for maximum absorption.

features.title: Clean Formulation
features.description: No Stevia (Uses Reb M), Allergen-Free, Non-GMO, Vegan-Friendly.

pillars.name: Comprehensive Nutritional Foundation
pillars.iconSvg: <svg viewBox="0 0 48 48" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><rect x="8" y="8" width="32" height="32" rx="4" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"/><path d="M16 24H32" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/><path d="M16 18H32" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/><path d="M16 30H24" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/></svg>
pillars.keyBenefits: The foundation of IM8 provides complete vitamin and mineral coverage to fill nutritional gaps in your daily diet with superior bioavailable forms.
keyIngredients: All essential vitamins (A, C, D, E, K1, K2, B-complex)
Vitamin D3: 1200 IU - From Vegan Lichen
Bioactive Forms: Quatrefolic® & Methylcobalamin for Superior Absorption

pillars.name: Superior Digestive Health Support

daily-ultimate-longevity.title: 5 Pillars of Longevity
daily-ultimate-longevity.subtitle: Cutting-edge science meets ancient wisdom to optimize your healthspan and support graceful aging.

features.title: Therapeutic Dosing
features.description: Clinically relevant doses of key longevity ingredients like NMN and Spermidine.

features.title: Synergistic Formulation
features.description: Ingredients selected to work together to amplify cellular repair and renewal.

features.title: Premium Purity
features.description: Rigorous testing for purity and potency, free from fillers and artificial additives.

pillars.name: Cellular Foundation Builder
pillars.iconSvg: <svg viewBox="0 0 48 48" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M12 28L24 22L36 28L24 34L12 28Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M12 20L24 14L36 20L24 26L12 20Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M12 20V28" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"></path><path d="M36 20V28" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"></path><path d="M24 26V34" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"></path></svg>
pillars.keyBenefits: Provides therapeutic dosages of two critical longevity amino acids that naturally decline with age, supporting cellular protection and longevity pathways.

pillars.name: Cellular Protection Activator
pillars.iconSvg: <svg viewBox="0 0 48 48" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M24 8L36 14V24C36 32 30 38 24 40C18 38 12 32 12 24V14L24 8Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><circle cx="24" cy="24" r="6" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"></circle><circle cx="24" cy="24" r="2" fill="currentColor"></circle></svg>
pillars.keyBenefits: Triple senolytic complex that targets cellular senescence—one of the primary hallmarks of aging—through complementary compounds that eliminate 'zombie cells'.

pillars.name: NMN NAD+ Energy Booster
pillars.iconSvg: <svg viewBox="0 0 48 48" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M26 8L14 26H24L22 40L34 22H24L26 8Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><circle cx="24" cy="24" r="16" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="4 4"></circle></svg>
pillars.keyBenefits: Combines the most direct NAD+ precursor with a mitochondrial biogenesis promoter for comprehensive cellular energy support and DNA repair.

pillars.name: Metabolic AMPK/SIRT1 Activator
pillars.iconSvg: <svg viewBox="0 0 48 48" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M24 8C15.163 8 8 15.163 8 24" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"></path><path d="M24 40C32.837 40 40 32.837 40 24" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"></path><path d="M8 24C8 32.837 15.163 40 24 40" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="4 4"></path><path d="M40 24C40 15.163 32.837 8 24 8" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="4 4"></path><path d="M24 4L24 12" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"></path><path d="M20 8L24 4L28 8" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M24 44L24 36" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"></path><path d="M28 40L24 44L20 40" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg>
pillars.keyBenefits: Enhanced bioavailability and metabolic support combined with powerful antioxidant protection for optimal metabolic function and cellular stress resistance.

pillars.name: Cellular Renewal Activator
pillars.iconSvg: <svg viewBox="0 0 48 48" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M38 24C38 31.732 31.732 38 24 38C16.268 38 10 31.732 10 24C10 16.268 16.268 10 24 10" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"></path><path d="M24 10L30 4" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"></path><path d="M24 10L30 16" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"></path><circle cx="24" cy="24" r="6" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"></circle></svg>
pillars.keyBenefits: Promotes autophagy—the cellular 'cleaning' process essential for healthy aging—removing damaged proteins and organelles for optimal cellular function.
